description:
<![CDATA[Why you need this:
A room, linen and body spray infused with mood-enhancing Chinese eucalyptus and peppermint oils, this beauty essential works to calm your mood, helping you in those high-stress moments.

Chinese eucalyptus  mint essential oils
Calming scent
Spray for room, linen and body

How it works:
By gently breathing in this gorgeously soothing scent, you'll be transported from your busy day-to-day life to the picturesque eucalyptus forests of China.
When to use:
Whether you're enjoying a moment of mindfulness in your own home, or need a moment of calm at work, just simply spritz this spray on to your clothing or body for an instant burst of calm.]]>
meta_keywords: <![CDATA[Planet Spa Aromatherapy Calm Spray | Toiletries | AVON UK]]>
title: Aromatherapy Calm Body Mist Spray - 100ml
